name: Helmed Horror

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The helmed horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell lightning bolt}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The helmed horror makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.
